definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Romanenko is also one of few explorers to have visited Wrangel Island.
sentences.chinese: 羅曼年科也是到過弗蘭格爾島的少數探險家之一。

sentences.english: With heavy knapsacks on their backs, the explorers plodded on their way up the snow-covered mountains.
sentences.chinese: 探險家們身背沉重的揹包，喫力地，一步步地爬上。

sentences.english: Explorers and tourists find their directions with the aids of compass and timekeeper.
sentences.chinese: 有了指南針和時區定位，探險家和遊人不再迷路。

sentences.english: The country has become the dreamland for many tourists and adventure lovers.
sentences.chinese: 這個國度成爲了旅行者跟探險家夢牽魂回的地方。

sentences.english: Zheng He was a mous Chinese explorer.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和是一位著名的中國探險家。

sentences.english: Voss is the masterpiece of the famous Australian writer, Patrick White.
sentences.chinese: 《探險家沃斯》是澳大利亞著名作家懷特的代表作。

sentences.english: Undaunted by danger, the explorers continued into the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 無視於危險，探險家繼續深入叢林。

sentences.english: Was it an early Portuguese explorer who traveled up the Mangoky River?
sentences.chinese: 是早期沿着曼戈基河逆流而上的葡萄牙探險家嗎？

sentences.english: It's toilsome of explorer to work.
sentences.chinese: 探險家的工作是很艱苦的。

sentences.english: Three British explorers are about to embark on a survey to map the Arctic Ocean's sea-ice cover.
sentences.chinese: 三位英國探險家即將啓程對北冰洋海冰進行勘查。

sentences.english: Those explorers gallantly adventured on unknown seas.
sentences.chinese: 那些探險家們大膽地在陌生的海域探險。

sentences.english: Canadian explorer and fur trader. Born in Bennington, N.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大毛皮商和探險家。

sentences.english: I get to be an explorer like the nineteenth-century explorers.
sentences.chinese: 我想成爲一個像十九世紀探險家一樣的探險者。

sentences.english: Think of the discomforts endured by explorers in the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 試想一想南極探險家忍受的艱難困苦。

sentences.english: Modern-day explorers set out in spacecraft to explore the moon and the universe.
sentences.chinese: 現在的探險家們，乘坐宇宙飛船，去探索月球和宇宙。

sentences.english: The explorers pooled their resources and bought a boat by which they began to search for the source of the river.
sentences.chinese: 探險家們湊錢買了條船，並憑此開始勳章河流的源頭。

pinyin: Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
Cristóbal Colón or Christopher Columbus (1451-1506)/Columbus, capital of Ohio
variant of 弗吉尼亞州|弗吉尼亚州/Virginia, US state
